Sentencas: An integrated novel process based on torrefaction, gasification, and solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) has been developed for biomass waste valorization.
Titulo: An innovative integration of torrefaction, gasification, and solid oxide fuel cell for carbon-neutral utilization of biomass waste: Process development, economic, exergy, advanced exergy, and exergoeconomics analysis

Sentencas: Process sustainability analysis has been done through economic, exergy, advanced exergy, and exergoeconomics indicators.
Titulo: An innovative integration of torrefaction, gasification, and solid oxide fuel cell for carbon-neutral utilization of biomass waste: Process development, economic, exergy, advanced exergy, and exergoeconomics analysis

Sentencas: According to economic analysis, the internal rate of return (IRR) of this process dropped to 7% at 100-90% of the process efficiency and this process is not economically feasible below 90% operational efficiency.
Titulo: An innovative integration of torrefaction, gasification, and solid oxide fuel cell for carbon-neutral utilization of biomass waste: Process development, economic, exergy, advanced exergy, and exergoeconomics analysis

Sentencas: While the subsidized process IRR dropped from 20 to 13% at 100-80% of the process efficiency.
Titulo: An innovative integration of torrefaction, gasification, and solid oxide fuel cell for carbon-neutral utilization of biomass waste: Process development, economic, exergy, advanced exergy, and exergoeconomics analysis

Sentencas: Subsidized process is also not economically feasible below 80% process efficiency.
Titulo: An innovative integration of torrefaction, gasification, and solid oxide fuel cell for carbon-neutral utilization of biomass waste: Process development, economic, exergy, advanced exergy, and exergoeconomics analysis

Sentencas: The overall process electric power generation potential from SOFC and steam turbine generator is around 1331 kW.
Titulo: An innovative integration of torrefaction, gasification, and solid oxide fuel cell for carbon-neutral utilization of biomass waste: Process development, economic, exergy, advanced exergy, and exergoeconomics analysis

Sentencas: Gasifier and HeatXC have the highest exergy destructions (1110.7 and 1220.9 kW) with exergy efficiencies of around 82% and 79%, respectively.
Titulo: An innovative integration of torrefaction, gasification, and solid oxide fuel cell for carbon-neutral utilization of biomass waste: Process development, economic, exergy, advanced exergy, and exergoeconomics analysis

Sentencas: Gasifier, HeatXC, and SOFC have significant potential of exergy improvement due to higher avoidable exergy destruction.
Titulo: An innovative integration of torrefaction, gasification, and solid oxide fuel cell for carbon-neutral utilization of biomass waste: Process development, economic, exergy, advanced exergy, and exergoeconomics analysis

Sentencas: Therefore, process exergy and economic performance can be improved by targeting these components.
Titulo: An innovative integration of torrefaction, gasification, and solid oxide fuel cell for carbon-neutral utilization of biomass waste: Process development, economic, exergy, advanced exergy, and exergoeconomics analysis
